 --/ Tony,MV Omari (DWT 28.460 Mts, Build 2001) open BAHODOPI, Indo  22nd  – 23rd Aug 2024.ROB: abt IFO 420 Mts and MGO 35 Mts M/V OMARI Type: Single deck self-trimming log is unfitted /bulk carrierClass: KR NK Built: 2001 Kanda, Japan Flag: Panama VietnamSummer Deadweight/draft/tpc: 28,460.18mt/9.767m/39.37mtLoa/Beam: 170.00m/27.00mGrt/Nrt: 17,433/9,829Grain/Bale (cbm): 37,732/36,683Ho/Ha: 5/5 Gears: 4 Sets x 25 mts Deck Crane. SPEED & CONSUMPTION:              "- ECO (WOG): Laden - about 10.4 knots on about 14.60mt 380 cst + 0.1 mt mdo, Ballast- about 11.0 knots on about 14.60 mt 380 cst + 0.1mt mdo.              "- FULL: Laden- about 11.3 knots on about 16.50mt 380 cst + 0.1 mt mdo, Ballast-about 12.0knots on about 16.5 mt 380 cst + 0.1mt mdo.              * In port: Idle ( G/E + Boiler) Consumption about 2.3 mt 380 cst + 0.1 mt mdo.              *working 24 hours ( G/E + Boiler ) Consumption about 4.5 mt 380 cst + 0.1 mt mdoBest regards,Tony (Minh Tuan Vu)Nueva Seas A/SHai Phong - Viet NamM: +84 983 848 265S: tuanvu710www.nueva.no
